title: Sorry
lyrics:
More than just complicated
And more than just okay
No it's not overrated
Every word you slay
Sorry

It doesn't always make it starry

Maybe next time be more charming

So you don't have to say Sorry, no

You don't have to say Sorry



Oh no...



Another lie and deception

Just a smile that's paid

You better change your reflection

And start a new crusade



Sorry

It doesn't always make it starry

Maybe next time be more charming

So you don't have to say Sorry, no

You don't have to say Sorry



No... Sorry...



Sorry

It doesn't always make it starry

Maybe next time be more charming

So you don't have to say Sorry, no

You don't have to say Sorry

Sorry

Maybe next time be more charming

So you don't have to say Sorry, no

You don't have to say Sorry

Sorry

No you don't have to say Sorry
